name: Crypto Tapper Simulator
description:
***Note to the our costumers: This app is just a game. Its main purpose is to have fun and no real Bitcoins can be obtained nor anything real can be bought or exchanged from playing this game!***

- "Crypto Tapper Simulator", is a simulation game where your main objective is to tap on the screen to obtain virtual Bitcoins. You may speed up the game by acquiring new in game graphics card(s) to do the tapping instead of you, but this task won't be so easy, because everything depends on how fast tapper you are and how quickly you gain virtual Bitcoins using only your fingers!

How many virtual Bitcoins can you acquire?
